entry.title: Justice in Life or Justice in Death?
entry.summary:
Author: Wolfer13579

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,364Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 40

Summary: 2.5 years after Jason Todd-Smith disappeared and believed dead, and Stephanie Brown has tried to move on, only to get her heart broken again. Trying to distract herself, she goes on patrol more often, and finds herself interested in Gotham’s newest vigilante.There’s only one problem; this new vigilante hates the Bats, and would rather see them dead, along with most of Gotham’s Rogues. Who is this man, and why does he choose to make Spoiler an exception from the group of vigilantes he wants dead?Takes place 6 months after the ending of Jason Todd-Smith
